item.title: SpringBoot Hello world
item.description: 使用Spring Initializr 新建spring boot project 在application.properties文件新建服务器端口 新建HelloController class 执行BootLunchApplication main class 1@SpringBootApplication 2@RestController 3public class DemoApplication { 4 5 public static void main(String[] args) { 6 SpringApplication.run(DemoApplication.class, args); 7 } 8 9 @GetMapping 10 public String hello() { 11 return "Hello World"; 12 } 13 14}
